entry.def: Linguistic abilities or ideas relate to language or linguistics.
Linguistics is the study of the way in which language works.

example.ex: Modern linguistics emerged as a distinct field in the nineteenth century.
example.tran: 现代语言学在19世纪作为一个独立的领域出现。
